name: Twitter & Tweetdeck Flat Dark
description:
[FR]
Thèmes twitter+tweetdeck Smooth en Darkmode.
Vous pouvez choisir la couleur du détails avec l'option "Advenced Style Settings" en dessous de la description.


[EN]
Themes twitter+tweetdeck Smooth in Darkmode.
You can choose the color of the details with the "Advenced Style Settings" option below the description.
additional_info:
[1.0.8] 23/08/2017
  • Edit color for user menu on Twitter.com
  • Edit color for btn button on Twitter.com
  • Add analytics colors (not all :/ )

[1.0.7] 29/07/2017
  • Edit color for Polls on Twitter.com
  • Edit color for btn button on Twitter.com
  • Loading bar color

[1.0.6] 26/07/2017
  • Add more color correction for Twitter.com
  • Edit color for Private Message on Twitter.com

[1.0.5] 20/06/2017
  • Add color for Follow status on Twitter.com

[1.0.4.0] 15/06/2017
  • Add/Fix new code for new Twitter.com

[1.0.3.1] 09/06/2017
  • Add Copyright

[1.0.3] 09/06/2017
  • Fix color of dialog box on Twitter.com
  • Fix live vidéo page color

[1.0.2] 08/06/2017
  • Fix color of new notification on Twitter.com

[1.0.1] 07/06/2017
  • Fix some bug on Tweetdeck

[1.0.0]
  • Theme launch
